mapper.select: SELECT h.id, h.community_id, h.house_id, c.NAME AS communityName, r.id as cityId, r.`name` as cityName, s.building, s.unit, s.floor, s.door FROM t_user_house AS h LEFT JOIN t_house AS s ON h.house_id = s.id LEFT JOIN t_community AS c ON h.community_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_region as r on c.city_id = r.id WHERE h.deleted = 0 AND s.deleted = 0 AND c.deleted = 0 AND h.uid = #{userId} AND check_status = 1
